Login.Title: Login
Login.OauthRegister: Your account has been created and an email has been sent to you.

Register.Title: Register
Register.GotAccount: Do you already have an account?
Register.Legal: Accept the terms of use and privacy policy
Register.Success: Email has been sent, please check your inbox.

Error.401: Username or email address already taken

RegisterVerify.Title: Verify account
RegisterVerify.Headline: Confirm your account by clicking the button.
RegisterVerify.Success: Email successfully confirmed, you will be redirected shortly.

ResetPassword.Title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.EnterIdentifyer: Enter your email address or username
ResetPassword.Success: If this email exists, an email will be sent to you.
ResetPassword.SuccessReset: Password reset successfully, you will be redirected shortly.

Main.ExplainPrivate: Here you can set your profile to private.
Main.ExplainNoPassword: Your account was created through a third-party app and you have been sent an email to set your password.

Links.EditDiscription: Here you can edit your linked pages. Select the platform and edit the value, click out of the field to save.
Links.CurrentLinksDescription: Here you can see all your linkable pages. You can also edit them above or delete them here.

Integrations.EditDescription: To integrate with Telegram, please enter your TG ID here and click out of the field to save.

Head.Title: Events
Head.SubTitle: Here you can create, join or manage events.

Placeholder.Description: A brief description of the event, you can use styling HTML tags.
